programme.desc: Mr Bull in a China Shop - While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S6 Ep619
programme.desc: Fruit - It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. Everyone is picking their favourite fruits to blend. George gets a special 'dinosaur' juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep111
programme.desc: The Cuddle Toy - Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher looses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies until Anna saves the day!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep112
programme.desc: The Mosquito - Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Boris - The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep306
programme.desc: A Blue's Clues Festival of Lights - Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah, the festival of lights! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special, surprise guest coming to our Hanukkah party, and we'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S1 Ep109
programme.desc: The Jungle Horn - Stripes loves his jungle horn, a special instrument that can summon all the animals in the jungle. But when a jealous Crusher steals it, Blaze and Stripes must speed after him in a wild chase to get it back.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep801
programme.desc: Pups Save a Runaway Rooster / Pups Save a Snowbound Cow - Chickaletta and Roosterio run away from a chicken show and get stuck on top of a runaway drone. // When Bettina wanders up Jake's mountain and gets caught in a snowstorm, it's up to the Paw Patrol to bring her safely down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep802
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sweet Mayor / Pups Save a Magic Trick - Encased in a huge chocolate bunny, Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons and ends up floating in Adventure Bay with a curious dolphin. // When a magic trick goes awry, the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Catfish Capers / Bubble Debacle - Lola tries her hand at being the park keeper for the day (Ian is on holiday) but things do not go according to her plan. // Sir Steel's attempts to clean up the Central Forest with a giant soap machine creates a huge bubble nightmare!

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Duck Dilemma - Kai invents a Roboduck to babysit the ducklings, but it goes haywire and takes down all the technology in Platinum City.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Paddington's First Chinese New Year / Paddington and the Missing Tickets - Ms. Potts is missing home, so Paddington decides to hold a surprise Chinese New Year Party. // Mr. Brown is taking the kids to the Circus tonight but where are the tickets? Paddington and the kids must retrace his steps to find them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping - The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them? // Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep502
programme.desc: The New House - Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep503
programme.desc: Basketball - Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep504
programme.desc: Horsey Twinkle Toes - There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep505
programme.desc: Naughty Tortoise - Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S6 Ep606
programme.desc: Winter Sports Chompetition! - Gil and Bubble Puppy are competing in the Winter Sports Chompetition--a competition for athletes and their dogs! Will they be able to stop reigning champs Coldsnap and his dog Mr. Husky from cheating to win the gold?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Welcome to Blue's Bistro - Welcome to Blue's Bistro - a very fancy restaurant! While playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to eat, we help Josh take our friends' orders and skidoo to Farmer Goat's farm to retrieve fresh vegetables!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep207
programme.desc: Sleepy Singalong with Blue - It's a nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite part of bedtime! As we search for clues, we help Blue and Polka Dots get clean, comfy, cozy and ready for bed.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S5 Ep511
programme.desc: Recycling Power! - When Axle City is visited by a littering raccoon, it's up to Blaze to save the day as a Super Recycling Truck! He cleans up the town and rescues his friends - just in time for a final showdown with the Litter Critter!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Silver Lasso / The Sea Dragon's Treasure - Santiago and Mami team up to take down an old foe and retrieve a lost family treasure. // After Enrique nabs a Sea Dragon's golden egg, it's up to the good pirates to nab it back before things get out of control.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Flow Bros - When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Pups Save a Super Pup / Pups Save Ryder's Robot - Rubble is pretending to be a super pup but get’s himself in some trouble. Ryder and the Paw Patrol have to save Rubble! // When Ryder’s Robot Pup breaks and starts going wild around Adventure Bay, it takes the whole Paw Patrol to help Ryder find it.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Paddington and the Bone / Paddington Joins a Band - Mr. Gruber has been loaned a T-Rex Skeleton, but Lucky the dog has stolen the priceless bone and buried it somewhere. // The kids decide to form a rock band with Paddington, but what instrument should he play, and what is rock music?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep502
programme.desc: The New House - Peppa and George are taken to visit the home that Mr Bull is building. Will they find out who their new neighbors are?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep503
programme.desc: Basketball - Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep504
programme.desc: Horsey Twinkle Toes - There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep127
programme.desc: Impatient Christopher - Christopher can hardly wait for his birthday tomorrow, he delivers invitations to his friends, he tries to figure out what present they are preparing for him. Christopher learns that sleeping is the fastest way for tomorrow to come sooner!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep128
programme.desc: The Statue of Friendship - Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S2 Ep219
programme.desc: Blue's Beach Bonanza - We've set up a tubular pretend beach in the backyard and play a game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to see there. We'll learn what items sink and float, and swim underwater to learn about camouflage with the help of our ocean friends.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep111
programme.desc: Mixed Up - Tinky Winky, Dispy, Laa-Laa and Po have their favourite things. The bag, the hat, the scooter and the ball all magically swap places and become mixed up.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S1) Ep16
programme.desc: Ball - Dee encourages a friend to say ball and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep50
programme.desc: Ice-Cream Sunny-Day - It's the middle of a blazing hot day - so hot that an ice cream shop is melting!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep76
programme.desc: Middle of Somewhere - The Kazoops family get lost in the middle of nowhere, but they soon discover a change of scenery can be as good as a holiday.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep39
programme.desc: The Sleepover - A sleepover with their cousin means Bluey and Bingo get to stay up late! But when Muffin shows up exhausted after missing her nap, the girls get more fun than they bargained for.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep10
programme.desc: The Cheese Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak when Roly inadvertently goes on the run with the world's smelliest cheese, earning their Cheese badges in the process.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep9
programme.desc: The Tree Badge - Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the amazing things trees do for the creatures who live amongst them, and earn their tree badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep8
programme.desc: The Big Day Out Badge - Duggee takes the Squirrels and their parents on an exciting mystery trip to a surprising destination, where they learn they can make anywhere special and earn their Big Day Out badges in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep47
programme.desc: The Blue Mountains, Jamaica - Trouble brews in Jamaica when Glitch's campfire threatens a coffee plantation.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep46
programme.desc: Bioluminescent Bay, Puerto Rico - Glitch's bath time puts the creatures of Puerto Rico's Bioluminescent Bay in bubble-trouble.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep38
programme.desc: Copycat - Bluey's having fun copying everything Dad says and does, but the game takes a serious turn when Bluey finds a hurt budgie and they have to make an emergency trip to the vet.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep37
programme.desc: The Adventure - Princesses, horses and magic wands. Bluey and Chloe can play any role they want, when they embark on an adventure to save their playground kingdom from the Greedy Queen.

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures (S1) Ep16
programme.desc: Stegosaurus and Painting - Andy Day searches in North America for a Stegosaurus - a plant eater that was as long as a double-decker bus.

programme.title: Catie's Amazing Machines (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Three-Wheeled Machines - Catie tests out three amazing machines that have three wheels: a motor trike, the fastest electric motorbike in the world and a tiny car.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S3) Ep3
programme.desc: The Line Song - Pirate Cannons and Tangled Net are the games in store for Sally, Ben, Noah and Isabelle as they try to win back Gem's jewels. Meanwhile, Line has written a song all about himself!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep7
programme.desc: The Pen Pal Badge - Duggee arranges for the Squirrels to write to some pen pals, helping them to learn all about life in far away places, earning their Pen Pal badges and making some new friends in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: The Being Quiet Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on an adventure to find a famously shy creature called The Snard who doesn't like noise time to earn their Being Quiet badges!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep5
programme.desc: The Get Indoors Badge - A weather warning from Duggee's barometer leads the Squirrels to round up all the creatures they can find outside and pile into the clubhouse for an impromptu party.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep45
programme.desc: The Gobi Desert, Mongolia - Glitch's giant drill causes a dino-disaster for the team's fossil hunt in the Gobi Desert.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep44
programme.desc: Maasai Mara National Park, Kenya - The team roars into action as Glitch tries to take a selfie with a lion in the Maasai Mara.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep10
programme.desc: Percy and the Calliope - Percy tries to fix an old calliope so that it isn't scrapped.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: Magic Panic - Umbrella needs Sarah and Duck's help after he promises to put on a magic show.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep5
programme.desc: Train Fudge - Sarah and Duck take an unexpected train trip whilst on their quest to buy some fudge.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep22
programme.desc: If a Tree Falls - Nelly and Nora go exploring to find out what made the big noise in the forest.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2) Ep21
programme.desc: You Can Be My Friend - Lola is very excited that Marv's little brother Morton is visiting, and is sure he will be her new friend, but Morton is very shy indeed.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: The Thing That Fell Down - When one of the twinkles in the night sky falls to the ground, Bob wants to see it up close.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: The Things That Fell Up - Gwen finds a butterfly for her collection, but its colours fade when she takes it away from its friends.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep36
programme.desc: Backpackers - Mum and Dad are going on an adventure wearing the kids as their cheeky backpacks! Seeing the sights and buying street food, backpacking is a blast - until they lose their passports.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep4
programme.desc: The Camouflage Badge - The Squirrels meet a chameleon called Cosey and learn about how to blend into their surroundings, earning their Camouflage Badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep3
programme.desc: The Day Off Badge - It's Duggee's Day Off but it's not long before the Squirrels show up to tell him about their adventures on their own days off... earning their Day Off badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep2
programme.desc: The Duck Badge - The clubhouse is inundated with stray ducklings who think Norrie is their mum, so Duggee and the Squirrels need to do some detective work to reunite them with their real mum.

programme.desc: Cappadocia, Turkey - A game of hide and seek threatens to topple the fairy chimneys of Cappadocia in Turkey.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep9
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep23
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Sandhagen vs. Song
programme.desc: Prelims - As two of the top fighters in the UFC’s most stacked weight class, Cory Sandhagen and Song Yadong haveproven worthy of their elite status, but on September 18, only one of these bantamweights will emergevictorious in the pivotal five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas. Owner of stirringknockout wins over Marlon Moraes and Frankie Edgar that skyrocketed him into the 135-pound title picture,Sandhagen is determined to get another shot at the belt, and the first order of business is beating China’sSong, an explosive force who has already dfeated the likes of Moraes, Marlon Vera and Julio Arce.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Sandhagen vs. Song
programme.desc: Main Event - As two of the top fighters in the UFC’s most stacked weight class, Cory Sandhagen and Song Yadong haveproven worthy of their elite status, but on September 18, only one of these bantamweights will emergevictorious in the pivotal five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas. Owner of stirringknockout wins over Marlon Moraes and Frankie Edgar that skyrocketed him into the 135-pound title picture,Sandhagen is determined to get another shot at the belt, and the first order of business is beating China’sSong, an explosive force who has already dfeated the likes of Moraes, Marlon Vera and Julio Arce.
